name: Square City Builder
description:
CHOOSE YOUR PATH

Do you want to play a strategy game, managing resources, adapting services, handling issues like map space and events? Yes, in this game you can. Do you just want to relax and build more and more buildings without problems? Yes, you can do that too! Square City Builder offers dynamic gameplay that adapts to each player's style.

BUILD, BUILD, AND BUILD

There are so many buildings in this game that provide hours of gameplay. You can place various levels of residential, commercial, or industrial buildings, each with their own characteristics.



A NEW FORM OF SCORING

In this game, you won't manage money to build, but to destroy. It's necessary to create a good strategy to manage the needs of constructions and the limited map space. On top of everything, events can change the course of things entirely and make everything more interesting...

A CLASSIC CITY BUILDER AESTHETIC!

Yes, in this game, you can reminisce about the old times when 2D city builders dominated this genre of games. It's a pixel art aesthetic greatly inspired by those times, bringing back that nostalgic feeling!



CURRENT FEATURES

Random map generator.
Custom weather seasons.
Events to face and deal with during the game, making the gameplay dynamic.
Various buildings such as businesses, residences, farms, roads, and much more.
Three game modes, with customizable rules by the player.
